ConversionMode: Method for converting the input mesh to a set of Planar Polygonal Faces in the output Volume.
bPreserveGroupBoundaries:
When true, adjacent coplanar groups will not be merged together into single faces. Not relevant if
conversion mode is set to emit all triangles separately.
bAutoSimplify: Determines whether mesh gets auto simplified when its triangle count is too high.
SimplifyMaxTriangles: Target triangle count for auto simplification when Auto Simplify is true.
NewVolumeType: Type of new Volume to create on Accept
